intro: Euphrasia bicknellii, commonly known as Bicknell's eyebright, is a small flowering plant native to the northeastern United States. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. It has hairy, oval-shaped leaves and is known for its medicinal properties in traditional herbal remedies. Euphrasia bicknellii is also considered a rare and endangered species due to habitat loss and environmental changes.
